document.title: [PSN] Mise a jour hebdo du 30/11/2011
document.author: JohnCouscous
document.text:
Hello, voici la mise à jour de la semaine (30/11/2011) sur le PlayStation Network :
PlayStation Store (via PS3, PSP et Media Go) Nouveaux contenus PlayStation Network Jeux complets (PS3) Sam & Max: Beyond Time & Space Bundle (Full Season – Episodes 1-5) (19.99€) – PEGI 12 Deus Ex: Human Revolution (49.99€) – PEGI 18 Deus Ex: Human Revolution – Complete Edition (59.99€) – PEGI 18 Comprend aussi the Explosive Mission, Tactical Enhancement, et The Missing Link DLC packs. Dead Island + Bloodbath DLC Bundle (44.99€) – PEGI 18 Ion Assault HD (9.99€) – PEGI 7 Galaga Legions DX & Pac-Man CE Dx Namco Generations Bundle (14.99€) – PEGI 3 Voltron: Defender Of The Universe (Essai et déblocage) (9.99€) – PEGI 12 Jeux complets (PSP) Space Invaders Extreme (9.99€) – PEGI 3 NBA 2K12 (29.99€) – PEGI 3 PES 2012 – Pro Evolution Soccer (19.99€) – PEGI 3 miniS The Big Head Bundle (comprend Zombie Racers, Retro Cave Flyer & Doodle Pool) (2.49€) – PEGI 12 Ajouts de jeux et contenus (PS3) Rock Band 3 – PEGI 12 – Ghost Of Perdition (1.49€) – In Waves (1.49€) – On The Backs Of Angels (1.49€) – We Built This City (1.49€) – Roadrunner Records Pack 02 (3.99€) Rock Band 2.0 – PEGI 12 – Conquer Me by Damone (1.49€) – If You Can’t Hang by Sleeping with Sirens (1.49€) – In Division by Underoath (1.49€) – Whiskey’s Got A Job To Do by Karla Davis (1.49€) – Until the Night (RB3 Version) by Free Spirit (1.49€) Agarest: Generations Of War Zero – PEGI 16 – Chaotic War Pack (1.99€) – Daily Life Extension Pack (1.99€) – Additional Costume 1 (4.99€) – Additional Costume 2 (4.99€) – Point Addition Pack 3 (3.99€) – Point Addition Pack 4 (4.99€) – PP Addition Pack 1 (6.19€) – PP Addition Pack 2 (7.99€) – TP Addition Pack (4.99€) – Formidable Pack (1.59€) – Halycon Days Pack (2.49€) – New Forbidden Book 1 (2.49€) – New Forbidden Book 2 (2.49€) – New Forbidden Book 3 (2.49€) – Prosaic Bonus Pack (2.99€) – Schie’s Bargain Pack (2.49€) – Supreme Weapon Pack (2.99€) – The L Family Pack (1.99€) – Tomorrow’s Hero Pack (2.49€) Dynasty Warriors 7: Xtreme Legends – PEGI 12 – Costume Pack 1 (0.99€) – New Weapon Pack 1 (2.99€) Mercury Hg – Rare Elements Pack (1.99€) – PEGI 3 Elevator Action Deluxe – Extra Character -TIME GAL- (gratuit) – PEGI 12 NBA 2K12 – NBA Legends Showcase (7.99€) – PEGI 3 Voltron: Defender of the Universe – Arena of Doom (1.99€) – PEGI 12 White Knight Chronicles II – PEGI 16 – Guild License – Prism Ticket – Prism Ticket X 5 – Prism Ticket X 10 – Guild Token Storage Ticket – Artefact Plans (Adolmaea Ii) – Artefact Plans (Adolmaea) – Artefact Plans (Black Knight Sword) – Artefact Plans (Dinivas Ii) – Artefact Plans (Dinivas) – Artefact Plans (Dragon Knight Spear) – Artefact Plans (Larvayne Ii) – Artefact Plans (Larvayne) – Artefact Plans (Sun King Sword) – Artefact Plans (White Knight Sword) – Artefact Plans (Wizel Ii) – Artefact Plans (Wizel) – Artefact Plans (Acutus Ii) – Artefact Plans (Acutus) – Artefact Plans (Antiquus Ii) – Artefact Plans (Antiquus) – Artefact Plans (Cornutus Ii) – Artefact Plans (Cornutus) – Artefact Plans (Cucullus Ii) – Artefact Plans (Cucullus) – Artefact Plans (Elementum Ii) – Artefact Plans (Elementum) – Artefact Plans (Fulguris Ii) – Artefact Plans (Fulguris) – Artefact Plans (Spina Ii) – Artefact Plans (Spina) – Artefact Plans (Velamun Ii) – Artefact Plans (Velamun) – Caesar Job Ticket – Cisna Job Ticket – Eldore Job Ticket – Framboise Job Ticket – Gold Colour Set – Grazel Job Ticket – Kara Job Ticket – Leonard Job Ticket – Miu Job Ticket – Rocco Job Ticket – Scardigne Job Ticket – Shapur Job Ticket – Vivid Aqua Colour Set – Vivid Blue Colour Set – Vivid Green Colour Set – Vivid Leaf Colour Set – Vivid Orange Colour Set – Vivid Pink Colour Set – Vivid Purple Colour Set – Vivid Red Colour Set – Yulie Job Ticket Avatars (PS3) Ace Combat: Assault Horizon – Avatar Pack 01 (1.99€) – Avatar Pack 02 (1.99€) – Avatar Pack 03 (1.99€) – Avatar Pack 04 (1.99€) Les Packs contiennent 10 avatars de chaque Fonds d’écran (PS3) 4 Elements HD – Wallpaper 4 Ra.One Wallpaper G.One Wallpaper Thèmes (PS3) Sport : – Premier Manager® 2012 Generic Theme 1 (gratuit) Jeux : – RAGE Premium Theme (1.49€) Nature : – In The Wild Theme (1.49€) – Views Of The World Theme (1.49€) – Wild World Theme (1.49€) Thèmes dynamiques (PS3) The Studio : – Christmas Advent Calender Dynamic Theme (2.99€) Abstrait : – Abstract Disco Ball (1.99€) Jeux : – Oddworld: Stranger’s Wrath HD (1.99€) – WWE ’12 Official Theme (1.99€) Nature : – Dynamic beach theme two (1.99€) – Dynamic gecko theme (1.99€) – Dynamic golden water theme (1.99€) – Dynamic ocean dawn theme (1.99€) Lieux : – Dynamic holiday in turkey theme (1.99€) – Dynamic Parliament Building Theme (1.99€) Saisons : – Dynamic Christmas Tree 2 (1.99€) – Dynamic Christmas Theme 3 (1.99€) Sport : – Dynamic Formula One Theme (1.99€)
Avec le calendrier de l’avent Playstation annoncé hier , certaines surprises sont à venir ! Voici déjà le contenu du jour, disponible jusqu’au 03/12 à 13h : Sonic the Hedgehog 2 qui sera disponible en téléchargement gratuit pour les abonnés Plus , remplacé en suite par un nouveau titre.
